lyrics:
40 contributorsmy plague lyricsverse 1
im in conniptions for the final act you came here for
the one derivative you manage is the one i abhor
i need a minute to elaborate for everyone the everyday
bullshit things that you have done
your impossible egofuck
is like a megalomaniacal tab on my tongue
you fuckin touch me i will rip you apart
ill reach in and take a bite out of that shit you call a heart

interlude
yeah
yeah
yeah

verse 2
i dont mind being ogled ridiculed made to feel minuscule
if you consider the source its kinda pitiful
the only thing you really know about me is
thats all youll ever know

chorus
i know why you blame me
i know why you blame yourself
i know why you plague me
i know why you plague yourself
see slipknot liveget tickets as low as 85you might also likeverse 3
im turning it around like a knife in the shell
i wanna understand why but im hurting myself
i havent seen a lotta reasons to stop it i cant just drop it
im just a bastard but at least i admit it
at least i admit it

chorus
i know why you blame me
i know why you blame yourself
i know why you plague me
i know why you plague yourself

yeah

kill you fuck you
i will never be you you

a snap of the synapse and now its fucking war
kill you fuck you
i will never be you you
